attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877252681. Comes with the remainder of a 5 year or 100 000kms warranty and service plan, expiring in April 2027.			
The Landtrek is by no means a soft bakkie. This great double cab, compares, pound for pound, with more traditional bakkie makes. Powerful, performs well, comfortable, spacious, luxurious and packed full of great comfort and tech features. This awesome bakkie is only a year old, very low mileage, in excellent condition and it looks amazing.			
Test drives are available, trade ins are welcome and finance can be arranged.			
Please note that the advertised price does not include admin fees of R8500 which will be charged on all vehicles sold.

The Suzuki Swift is one of life’s easier choices. Packed with new looks, remarkable technologies, our new compact car looks and feels much larger than it really is. The inside is nicely laid out, and finish of a high standard, Comes with comfortable and supportive seats, plenty of leg room in front and back. This amazing vehicle is packed with features such as Electrically folding mirrors, Keyless entry with push start button a 7" Touch Screen radio with reverse camera and blue tooth connectivity.

Trade Ins Welcome. Finance Available.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877248729. **LIMITED EDITION - EXTREME**
**EXTRAS WORTH OVER R 100 000**
**BALANCE OF SERVICE PLAN**
**BALANCE OF WARRANTY**
**OFFROAD ALLOYS WHEELS AND TYRES**
**TOWBAR**
**TOURNEAU COVER**
**ROOF RACKS*

Under the bonnet, the 2.4-litre MIVEC turbo diesel engine does duty and it produces 133 kW and 430 Nm. 
The cabin gains Android Auto/Apple CarPlay as well as a sport automatic gearshift knob. The rear tailgate also features the 'Ezydown' hydraulic dampers, making tailgate operation easy. The load box has also been professionally rubberised and there's a tonneau cover.

The exterior of the Mitsubishi Triton Xtreme really looks the part. The Xtreme kit comprises a new black bumper with grille, bonnet protector, headlight covers, fender flares, roof rack supports, taillight covers, style bar, A-line Hazard mag wheels wrapped in Pirelli Scorpion All-Terrain tyres as well as a Bosal tow bar.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877248729. **ALL NEW 2022 HONDA BR-V COMFORT CVT**

**16” ALLOY WHEELS**
**LED HEADLIGHTS AND TAIL LIGHTS**
**7" TOUCH SCREEN RADIO**
**PUSHH BUTTON START**
**REAR VIEW CAMERA**
**APPLE CARPLAY AND ANDROID AUTO**

**WARRANTY 5 YEARS / 200,000KM**
**SERVICE PLAN 4 YEARS / 60,000KM**
**AA ROADSIDE ASSISTANCE 3 YEARS**

TOUGH
YET GRACEFUL
The All-New BR-V design presents a dynamic body shape with strong
contour lines that run along the body to accentuate the length of the new model. A design that is dominating, yet elegant. The front end has been redesigned to incorporate an aggressive, sporty new grille that seamlessly flows into the LED Daytime Running Lights and headlamps, giving the new model a confident appearance.
